table.name: tCharacter
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE tCharacter ( id integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, SiId int NOT NULL, Charact varchar, Value varchar, /* Foreign keys */ FOREIGN KEY (SiId) REFERENCES tSI(SiId) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION )

constraint.definition: FOREIGN KEY (SiId) REFERENCES tSI(SiId) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION

table.name: tContacts
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE tContacts ( id integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, SiId int NOT NULL, Name varchar, Org varchar, Addr varchar, Description varchar, /* Foreign keys */ FOREIGN KEY (SiId) REFERENCES tSI(SiId) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE CASCADE )

constraint.definition: FOREIGN KEY (SiId) REFERENCES tSI(SiId) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE CASCADE

table.name: tDepartments
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE tDepartments ( id integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, department varchar NOT NULL )

table.name: tMeasureCodes
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE tMeasureCodes ( id integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, Name varchar NOT NULL )

row.value: Вимірювання параметрів потоку, витрати, рівня, об’

table.name: tPackage
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE tPackage ( id integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, SiId integer NOT NULL, Name varchar, Count varchar, /* Foreign keys */ FOREIGN KEY (SiId) REFERENCES tSI(SiId) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION )

constraint.definition: FOREIGN KEY (SiId) REFERENCES tSI(SiId) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION

table.name: tPlacement
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE tPlacement ( id integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, Placement varchar NOT NULL )

table.name: tPov
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE tPov ( id integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, SiId integer NOT NULL, PovDate date NOT NULL, Scan blob, Doc varchar, /* Foreign keys */ FOREIGN KEY (SiId) REFERENCES tSI(SiId) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE CASCADE )

constraint.definition: FOREIGN KEY (SiId) REFERENCES tSI(SiId) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE CASCADE

table.name: tResposible
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE tResposible ( id integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, RespPerson varchar NOT NULL )

row.value: А.Ю. Костюк, М.В. Беленькая, С.В. Мащенко

table.name: tService
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE tService (id integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, SiId int NOT NULL, ServDate date, ServType integer REFERENCES tServTypes (id) ON UPDATE CASCADE, Executor varchar, Description varchar, NextDate DATE, FOREIGN KEY (SiId) REFERENCES tSI (SiId) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE CASCADE)

constraint.definition: FOREIGN KEY (SiId) REFERENCES tSI (SiId) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE CASCADE

table.name: tServTypes
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE tServTypes ( id integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, Name varchar, Period integer )

row.value: Чистка вентиляторов в отсеке фор-вакуумных насосов

table.name: tSI
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE tSI (SiId integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, Name varchar NOT NULL, SN varchar NOT NULL, RespPerson integer REFERENCES tResposible (id) ON UPDATE CASCADE, Department integer REFERENCES tDepartments (id) ON UPDATE CASCADE, Placement integer REFERENCES tPlacement (id) ON UPDATE CASCADE, ManufactDate date, InvNum varchar, DevCode varchar, MeasureCode integer REFERENCES tMeasureCodes (id) ON UPDATE CASCADE, Status integer REFERENCES tStatus (id) ON UPDATE CASCADE, IsMeasure BOOLEAN, PovPeriod integer, min varchar (50), max varchar (50), error varchar, unit varchar, Type integer REFERENCES tTypes (id) ON UPDATE CASCADE, nWorkPlace varchar)

table.name: tStatus
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE tStatus (id integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, Status varchar NOT NULL)

table.name: tTypes
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE tTypes ( id integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, Type varchar )

table.name: tWorkLog
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE tWorkLog (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, SiId INTEGER REFERENCES tSI (SiId) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, Name VARCHAR (255), Description VARCHAR (255), Date DATETIME)

constraint.definition: REFERENCES tSI (SiId) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION

table.name: tWorkPlaces
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE tWorkPlaces ( id integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, Workplace integer NOT NULL )

view.name: vCard
view.ddl: CREATE VIEW vCard AS SELECT SI.SiId, SI.Name, SI.SN, SI.InvNum, SI.DevCode, SI.nWorkPlace, Pl.Placement, d.Department, r.RespPerson, strftime('%Y',SI.ManufactDate) AS ManufactDate, t.Type, s.status, date(p.PovDate,'+'||SI.PovPeriod||' month') AS NextPov FROM tSI AS SI LEFT JOIN tResposible AS r ON SI.RespPerson = r.id LEFT JOIN tPlacement as Pl on SI.Placement=Pl.id LEFT JOIN tDepartments as d on SI.Department=d.id LEFT JOIN tTypes as t ON SI.Type=t.id LEFT JOIN tStatus as s ON SI.Status=s.id LEFT JOIN vLastPov as p ON SI.SiId=p.SiId -- WHERE p.PovDate=(SELECT MAX(tPov.PovDate) from tPov where tPov.SiId=SI.SiId ) or NextPov=NULL ORDER BY D.department desc
view.select: SELECT SI.SiId, SI.Name, SI.SN, SI.InvNum, SI.DevCode, SI.nWorkPlace, Pl.Placement, d.Department, r.RespPerson, strftime('%Y',SI.ManufactDate) AS ManufactDate, t.Type, s.status, date(p.PovDate,'+'||SI.PovPeriod||' month') AS NextPov FROM tSI AS SI LEFT JOIN tResposible AS r ON SI.RespPerson = r.id LEFT JOIN tPlacement as Pl on SI.Placement=Pl.id LEFT JOIN tDepartments as d on SI.Department=d.id LEFT JOIN tTypes as t ON SI.Type=t.id LEFT JOIN tStatus as s ON SI.Status=s.id LEFT JOIN vLastPov as p ON SI.SiId=p.SiId -- WHERE p.PovDate=(SELECT MAX(tPov.PovDate) from tPov where tPov.SiId=SI.SiId ) or NextPov=NULL ORDER BY D.department desc

view.name: vLastPov
view.ddl: CREATE VIEW vLastPov AS SELECT tSI.SiId AS SiId, tSI.Name AS Name, tSI.SN AS SN, tSI.RespPerson AS RespPerson, tSI.Department AS Department, tSI.Placement AS Placement, tPov.PovDate AS PovDate FROM tPov LEFT OUTER JOIN tSI ON (tPov.SiId = tSI.SiId) GROUP BY tPov.SiId
view.select: SELECT tSI.SiId AS SiId, tSI.Name AS Name, tSI.SN AS SN, tSI.RespPerson AS RespPerson, tSI.Department AS Department, tSI.Placement AS Placement, tPov.PovDate AS PovDate FROM tPov LEFT OUTER JOIN tSI ON (tPov.SiId = tSI.SiId) GROUP BY tPov.SiId

view.name: vMain
view.ddl: CREATE VIEW vMain AS SELECT S.SiId, S.Name, S.SN, p.PovDate FROM tSI S INNER JOIN tPov p ON S.SiId = p.SiId
view.select: SELECT S.SiId, S.Name, S.SN, p.PovDate FROM tSI S INNER JOIN tPov p ON S.SiId = p.SiId

view.name: vService
view.ddl: CREATE VIEW vService AS SELECT S.ServDate, tSI.Name, tSI.SN, t.Name, S.Description, date(S.ServDate, '+' || t.Period || ' month') AS NextService FROM tService AS S INNER JOIN tSI ON tSI.SiId = S.SiId INNER JOIN tServTypes AS t ON t.id = S.ServType
view.select: SELECT S.ServDate, tSI.Name, tSI.SN, t.Name, S.Description, date(S.ServDate, '+' || t.Period || ' month') AS NextService FROM tService AS S INNER JOIN tSI ON tSI.SiId = S.SiId INNER JOIN tServTypes AS t ON t.id = S.ServType

view.name: vSticker
